person.persName: John G. Bailey (Hopkins Co. KY, attorney)

body.p: Madisonville, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Married to Adaline G. McElroy Bailey in Union County, Kentucky, in September of 1860. Father of Edward H. Bailey. Student in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Attorney in Hopkins County in 1860. Attorney in Hopkins County in 1863.
